comments.body: Should there be a check if the file exists if overwrite is `False`, and if it does, return `changed=False`?

comments.body: Are you sure `vim.fault.FileAlreadyExists` can be raised by `InitiateFileTransferToGuest`, it is [not listed in the doc](https://github.com/vmware/pyvmomi/blob/master/docs/vim/vm/guest/FileManager.rst) ?

        result['msg'] = "Guest file %s already exists" % dest

comments.body: It people are trying to download a non-exiting file, the execution should fail, because this is unexpected behaviour and should clearly be mentioned.
As there is a required_if, this can be removed

comments.body:
Maybe we can write the file in tmp and make a diff or compute it's md5sum to know if the file was already fetched.

But it could be done later.
